title: Nelson j Beverly Hills Moisture Healing Shampoo - 8 oz
features: Hair Shampoo Hair cleanser Natural Hair Care
This cleanser gently cleanses and infuses each strand with antioxidant-rich argan oil and highly reparative keratin, proteins and other nutrients.
Sulfate & Paraben FREE. PH Balanced. NO Junky Build Up.
Best for dry, damaged, or color-treated hair type.
description: * Product Description: It features 5 in 1 formula for hair that has been weakened or damaged by color, chemical processing or heat styling. - First Argan Oil based shampoo that gently cleanses and infuses each strand with antioxidant-rich argan oil and highly reparative keratin, proteins and other nutrients. - Sulfate & Paraben FREE. - Best for dry, damaged, or color-treated hair type. ** DIRECTIONS OF USE: Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water. Apply quarter size amount of Argan Oil 7 Moisture Healing Shampoo. Lather well and rinse. Repeat if necessary *** INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Sodium Arganate (derived from Argan Oil), Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate (derived from Coconut Oil), Decyl Glucoside (derived from Coconut Oil and Sugar), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (derived from Coconut Oil), PEG-150 Distearate (Derived from Coconut Oil), Glycol Stearate (derived from Coconut Oil), Phenoxyethanol (derived from alcohol), Benzyl Alcohol (derived from flowers), Potassium Sorbate (derived from Sorbic Acid), Tetrasodium EDTA, Fragrance.

title: Nutriplenish deep moisture shampoo
